Payments to Veterans From a State or Municipality Due to Injury or Disease
Exclude up to $5,000.00 per year of income from a State or municipality that is paid to the Veteran as a Veterans’ benefit due to injury or disease when determining annual income for Veterans Pension benefits.
Note
:  This applies to determinations of annual income for calendar years beginning January 1, 2012.
Reference
:  For more information on this exclusion, see
38 U.S.C. 1503(a)(11)
.
